about_the_game:
Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points, but try not to drop any! Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to determine the superior Egg Chef.

Catch eggs with your frying pan as they fall from above. Try to flip them as many times as you can to multiply your egg score, but be careful not to drop them as you will lose points.

Play against your friends in online multiplayer to see who's best. Catch Items as they drop from above to either enhance your cooking or hinder your opponents' cooking.

Key Features:

  • Move the frying pan to catch and flip eggs
  • Deliver cooked eggs to score points
  • Flip eggs to multiply their point value
  • Online multiplayer
  • Catch falling Items to use them to your advantage

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points while avoiding dropping eggs. Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to see who the best egg chef is. Catch falling Items for a competitive advantage.
